content: gaming gloves by haulaway knits when gaming on my popcorn my fingers get so cold but wearing gloves causes me to lose dexterity fingerless gloves work better but i hate the feel of the glove between my hand and the mouse for years i ve thought i wish i could have a glove with no palm that would work great i found a palmless mitt pattern from 1933 that i used as a base and added fingers i can t be the only person in the whole world with this problem so i m sharing it with you may your fingers be warm and your attacks always do maximum damage needles * if you prefer to use us size 2 dpns* circulars and the magic loop yarn method go for it about 75 yds/68m fingering weight/sock yarn additional supplies stitch holder scrap yarn or more dpns to hold stitches needle to weave in ends a stitch marker clip-on kind would work best as written the glove is 4 from the top of the cuff to the base of the fingers 16 sts and 22 row = 2 and 3 5 across the knuckles these gloves fit my tiny baby hands but may not fit yours you can probably adjust the size by changing needle size adding or subtracting row in the hand section or even adjusting the number of cast on stitches the world is your oyster 2 | page gaming gloves by haulaway knits k knit cast on 42 join in the round place marker p purl i recommend a stretchy cast on i like german twisted ktog knit together round round round 1 k1p1 around repeat round 1 29 times for a total of 30 rounds of ribbing or however long you want the cuff row 1 k42 turn work do not join row 2 p42 turn work repeat row 1 & 2 13 times for a total of 28 row of stockinette from the top of the cuff ribbing to here k12 slip those stitches onto a holder this will be the thumb later k the remaining stitches turn p30 turn row 3 k30 turn row 4 p30 turn work row 3 & 4 6 times for a total of 14 additional row of stockinette l index row 5 k8 place remaining stitches on a holder then continuing from the k8 you just did cast on 8 sts i recommend the knitted cast on but do what works best for you join in the round k around for 20 rounds round 6 k1p1 around repeat round 6 4 times for a total of 5 rounds of ribbing bind off the 16 sts i recommend
